author: ralexstokes
content:
**ACDC #167**
going to lean on forkcast for the notes/summary (it is AI-generated but looks pretty good from a skim), see here: https://discord.com/channels/595666850260713488/745077610685661265/1428412675804626944

will call out some key take-aways:

**ACDC #167 takeaways**
* Fusaka testnets going well!
  * Sepolia BPO1 coming next at 2025-10-21 03:26:24 UTC
* Fusaka mainnet temp check
  * We did NOT confirm dates today
  * Attendees were supportive of the following
    * Mainnet releases: 3 Nov 2025
    * (tentative) Mainnet date: 3 Dec 2025
  * Will confirm on next ACDE
* Trustless payments in ePBS
  * Some discussion around separating the payments design from EIP-7732
  * Check the call for full color
  * Agreed to leave as is, with _no change_ to the spec

content: I think it might also help to include breaking changes in forkcast as it seems like a lot of people read it to get a summary of the fork now
